message.heading: I'm from the future. I came here in a Time Machine that you invented. Now I need your help to get back to the year 1985.

message.heading: See you later, Pop. Whoo! Time to change that oil.

message.heading: I have your car towed all the way to your house and all you got for me is lite beer?
